text: people are very confused you talk all
the time about a bad deal which you
won't accept can you explain what in
your mind would be a bad deal well yes I
think you on the one hand David you've
got politicians in Europe some of whom
are talking about punishing the UK for
leaving the EU I think what they want to
see in terms of that punishment would be
a bad deal and secondly you've got
politicians here in the United Kingdom
who seem to be willing to accept any
deal whatever it is just for the sake of
getting a deal and I think the danger is
they'd be accepting the worst possible
deal at the highest possible price
